name: WKMediaCaptureType
desc: An enumeration listing the types of media devices that can capture audio, video, or both.

items.name: case camera
items.desc: A media device that can capture video.

items.name: case cameraAndMicrophone
items.desc: A media device or devices that can capture audio and video.

items.name: case microphone
items.desc: A media device that can capture audio.
